title: Free Coaching/Mentoring :3
body:
Hey guys! So I've been bored lately and decided why not help low elo players improve their knowledge,  champion pool, elo, gameplay etc.  It's my first time doing this so please do bear with me ;-; 

About me:
I've been playing league roughly 2-3 years now. I'm plat 5 (technically 3 because of my other account) and I mostly main/play support,adc and mid, I can fill but preferably/mostly play the 3 roles mentioned above.  My knowledge/understandings about league in my opinion is significantly high, I do know what to buy in terms of items, peeling, comps, laning phase, shot calling etc.

Requirements: 
So since I'm giving free lessons and spending my time potentially with you, I want people who are committed or determined to learning and improving in league, yes we can have some fun lessons and just screw around :D but I won't accept people who are extremely toxic or unable to take criticism. Preferably bronze-gold.

Just add me: Fukushu and we can start straight away if you like.

replies.body: i'm a top lane. Renekton main. Mind giving me some advice?
Hey, I could use some help im currently mainADC and im fairly new to ranked, im b4 and feel that im pretty decent but findit difficult to rank up, any help is appreciated. thanks :)

I'm new to ranked, currently bronze 2 and I need help with learning the meta and how to play from behind. I am very comfortable with {{champion:202}} in ranked atm. Hopefully you won't mind coaching me :)

Hey, would love some help on mid lane especially when facing champs that counter me or are simply better players. I also struggle to really take advantage of a 1 or 2 kill lead early as well as roaming to help other lanes with this advantage. I am b5, i wander from b2 to b5 and around

hey would you mind coaching me, i'm a support/top lane main so i think you could help, my in game name is Flash Gordon and im like silver 4 so im pretty trash haha, need a bit of a coach must admit

Im diamond 5 can u coach me pls im boosted af <3
